original_text: He will ravage your settlements on the mainland with the sword; he will set up siege works against you, build a ramp up to your walls and raise his shields against you.
korean_text: 그가 들에 있는 너의 딸들을 칼로 죽이고 너를 치려고 사다리를 세우며 토성을 쌓으며 방패를 갖출 것이며

sentences.original_text: He will ravage your settlements on the mainland with the sword
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 칼로 본토에 있는 너의 정착지를 황폐하게 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: he will set up siege works against you
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너를 대적하여 포위 공격 시설을 설치할 것이다

sentences.original_text: build a ramp up to your walls
and raise his shields against you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너를 향해 그의 방패들을 올릴 것이다
